properties.name: ComponentName
properties.description: The name of the component.

type.description: The name of the component.

properties.name: ComponentTypeId
properties.description: The ID of the component type.

type.description: The ID of the component type.

properties.name: DefinedIn
properties.description: The name of the property definition set in the component.

type.description: The name of the property definition set in the component.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the component.

type.description: The description of the component.

properties.name: Properties
properties.description: An object that maps strings to the properties to set in the component type. Each string in the mapping must be unique to this object.

type.description: An object that maps strings to the properties to set in the component type. Each string in the mapping must be unique to this object.

properties.name: PropertyGroups
properties.description: An object that maps strings to the property groups to set in the component type. Each string in the mapping must be unique to this object.

type.description: An object that maps strings to the property groups to set in the component type. Each string in the mapping must be unique to this object.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The current status of the entity.

type.description: The current status of the entity.

DataType.description: An object that specifies the data type of a property.

properties.name: AllowedValues
properties.description: The allowed values for this data type.

type.description: The allowed values for this data type.

properties.name: NestedType
properties.description: The nested type in the data type.

type.description: The nested type in the data type.

properties.name: Relationship
properties.description: A relationship that associates a component with another component.

type.description: A relationship that associates a component with another component.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The underlying type of the data type.

type.description: The underlying type of the data type.

properties.name: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: The unit of measure used in this data type.

type.description: The unit of measure used in this data type.

DataValue.description: An object that specifies a value for a property.

properties.name: BooleanValue
properties.description: A Boolean value.

type.description: A Boolean value.

properties.name: DoubleValue
properties.description: A double value.

type.description: A double value.

properties.name: Expression
properties.description: An expression that produces the value.

type.description: An expression that produces the value.

properties.name: IntegerValue
properties.description: An integer value.

type.description: An integer value.

properties.name: ListValue
properties.description: A list of multiple values.

type.description: A list of multiple values.

properties.name: LongValue
properties.description: A long value.

type.description: A long value.

properties.name: MapValue
properties.description: An object that maps strings to multiple DataValue objects.

type.description: An object that maps strings to multiple DataValue objects.

properties.name: RelationshipValue
properties.description: A value that relates a component to another component.

type.description: A value that relates a component to another component.

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: A string value.

type.description: A string value.

properties.name: Definition
properties.description: An object that specifies information about a property.

type.description: An object that specifies information about a property.

properties.name: Configuration
properties.description: An object that specifies information about a property.

type.description: An object that specifies information about a property.

properties.name: DataType
properties.description: An object that contains information about the data type.

type.description: An object that contains information about the data type.

properties.name: DefaultValue
properties.description: An object that contains the default value.

type.description: An object that contains the default value.

properties.name: IsExternalId
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property ID comes from an external data store.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property ID comes from an external data store.

properties.name: IsFinal
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition can be updated.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition can be updated.

properties.name: IsImported
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition is imported from an external data store.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition is imported from an external data store.

properties.name: IsInherited
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition is inherited from a parent entity.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property definition is inherited from a parent entity.

properties.name: IsRequiredInEntity
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property is required.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property is required.

properties.name: IsStoredExternally
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property is stored externally.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property is stored externally.

properties.name: IsTimeSeries
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property consists of time series data.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the property consists of time series data.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value of the property.

type.description: The value of the property.

PropertyDefinitionConfiguration.description: An object that specifies information about a property.

PropertyGroup.description: An object that specifies information about a property group.

properties.name: GroupType
properties.description: The type of property group.

type.description: The type of property group.

properties.name: PropertyNames
properties.description: The list of property names in the property group.

type.description: The list of property names in the property group.

properties.name: RelationshipType
properties.description: The type of the relationship.

type.description: The type of the relationship.

properties.name: TargetComponentTypeId
properties.description: The ID of the target component type associated with this relationship.

type.description: The ID of the target component type associated with this relationship.

types.description: Error object with Message and Code.

properties.name: Components
properties.description: A map that sets information about a component type.

type.description: A map that sets information about a component type.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the entity.

type.description: The description of the entity.

properties.description: The ID of the entity.

type.description: The ID of the entity.

properties.description: The name of the entity.

type.description: The name of the entity.

properties.name: ParentEntityId
properties.description: The ID of the parent entity.

type.description: The ID of the parent entity.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

type.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: WorkspaceId
properties.description: The ID of the workspace.

type.description: The ID of the workspace.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The ARN of the entity.

type.description: The ARN of the entity.

properties.name: CreationDateTime
properties.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

type.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

properties.name: HasChildEntities
properties.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the entity has child entities or not.

type.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the entity has child entities or not.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The current status of the entity.

type.description: The current status of the entity.

properties.name: UpdateDateTime
properties.description: The last date and time when the entity was updated.
